data.lyric:
[ti:Insomnia (《QQ飞车手游》游戏背景歌曲)]
[ar:Craig David]
[al:Greatest Hits (Int'l Non-Video)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Insomnia - Craig David (克雷格·大卫)
[00:02.78]Composed by：Craig David/Jim Beanz
[00:05.57]Jim Beanz
[00:07.18]Give it to me
[00:10.05]Oh baby I can't
[00:12.77]
[00:16.56]Never thought that I'd fall in love love love love
[00:18.85]
[00:20.38]But it grew from a simple crush crush crush crush
[00:22.72]
[00:23.68]Being without you girl I was all messed up up up up
[00:26.53]
[00:27.43]When you walked out said that you'd had enough enough enough enough
[00:30.64]Been a fool girl I know
[00:32.74]
[00:34.17]Didn't expect this is how things would go
[00:36.69]
[00:37.92]Maybe in time you'll change your mind
[00:40.31]
[00:41.60]Now looking back I wish I could rewind
[00:44.03]
[00:45.85]Because I can't sleep till you're next to me
[00:48.96]
[00:49.56]No I can't live without you no more
[00:52.14]
[00:53.25]Oh I stay up till you're next to me
[00:56.81]
[00:57.42]Till this house feels like it did before
[00:59.28]
[01:00.89]Feels like insomnia ah ah feels like insomnia ah ah
[01:06.96]
[01:08.53]Feels like insomnia ah ah feels like insomnia ah ah
[01:14.76]
[01:17.26]Remember telling my boys that I'd never fall in love love love love
[01:20.18]
[01:20.84]You used to think I'd never find a girl I could trust trust trust trust
[01:23.93]
[01:24.73]And then you walked into my life
[01:25.93]And it was all about us us us us
[01:27.69]
[01:28.47]But now I'm sitting here thinking I messed the whole thing up up up up
[01:32.01]Been a fool fool girl I know know
[01:34.81]
[01:35.49]Didn't expect this is how things would go
[01:37.85]
[01:39.04]Maybe in time time you'll change your mind mind
[01:42.56]
[01:43.17]Now looking back I wish I could rewind
[01:45.15]
[01:47.27]Because I can't sleep till you're next to me
[01:50.89]No I can't live without you no more
[01:53.26]
[01:54.72]Oh I stay up till you're next to me
[01:57.80]
[01:58.58]Till this house feels like it did before
[02:00.57]
[02:02.27]Feels like insomnia ah ah feels like insomnia ah ah
[02:08.09]
[02:09.44]Feels like insomnia ah ah ah feels like insomnia ah ah
[02:15.72]
[02:18.05]Ah I just can't go to sleep
[02:21.88]
[02:23.55]Cause it feels like I've fallen for you
[02:25.68]
[02:26.99]It's getting way too deep
[02:29.49]
[02:31.03]And I know that it's love because
[02:32.93]
[02:33.68]I can't sleep till you're next to me
[02:36.31]
[02:36.82]No I can't live without you no more
[02:39.30]
[02:40.85]Oh I stay up till you're next to me
[02:44.00]

data.trans:
[ti:Insomnia]
[ar:Craig David]
[al:Rewind - The Collection]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.78]//
[00:05.57]//
[00:07.18]将你交给我吧
[00:10.05]亲爱的 我不能
[00:12.77]
[00:16.56]我从未想过我会坠入爱河
[00:18.85]
[00:20.38]从一次单纯的迷恋
[00:22.72]
[00:23.68]失去你的我 现在真是一团糟
[00:26.53]
[00:27.43]当你离开时说 你已经受够了
[00:30.64]我知道我是傻瓜
[00:32.74]
[00:34.17]从未想到事情会演变成这样
[00:36.69]
[00:37.92]或许一段时间后 你会改变心意
[00:40.31]
[00:41.60]回首过去 真希望一切可以重头开始
[00:44.03]
[00:45.85]因为没你在身边 我无法入眠
[00:48.96]
[00:49.56]不 失去你我无法再活下去
[00:52.14]
[00:53.25]喔 在你回来之前 我会彻夜难眠
[00:56.81]
[00:57.42]直到这屋子重回以前的样子
[00:59.28]
[01:00.89]这感觉就像失眠啊 这感觉就像失眠啊
[01:06.96]
[01:08.53]这感觉就像失眠啊 这感觉就像失眠啊
[01:14.76]
[01:17.26]曾经和朋友说过我不会坠入爱河
[01:20.18]
[01:20.84]你过去也认为我不会找到一个值得信任的女孩
[01:23.93]
[01:24.73]之后你走进了我的生命
[01:25.93]而现在的所有都是我和你
[01:27.69]
[01:28.47]但现在我只能坐着想着我把整件事搞砸了
[01:32.01]我知道我是傻瓜
[01:34.81]
[01:35.49]从未想到事情会演变成这样
[01:37.85]
[01:39.04]或许一段时间后 你会改变心意
[01:42.56]
[01:43.17]回首过去 真希望一切可以重头开始
[01:45.15]
[01:47.27]因为没你在身边 我无法入眠
[01:50.89]不 失去你我无法再活下去
[01:53.26]
[01:54.72]喔 在你回来之前 我会彻夜难眠
[01:57.80]
[01:58.58]直到这屋子重回以前的样子
[02:00.57]
[02:02.27]这感觉就像失眠啊 这感觉就像失眠啊
[02:08.09]
[02:09.44]这感觉就像失眠啊 这感觉就像失眠啊
[02:15.72]
[02:18.05]啊 我真的无法入睡
[02:21.88]
[02:23.55]因为我已经爱上你了
[02:25.68]
[02:26.99]越来越无法自拔
[02:29.49]
[02:31.03]因为我知道这就是爱
[02:32.93]
[02:33.68]没你在身边我无法入睡
[02:36.31]

[02:44.00]
[02:44.58]直到这屋子重回以前的样子
[02:46.42]
[02:48.02]这感觉就像失眠啊 这感觉就像失眠啊
[02:54.04]
